title: Richard Boone | I Bury the Living (1958, Horror) Colorized Movie by Albert Band

sources.title: Richard Boone | I Bury the Living (1958, Horror) Colorized Movie by Albert Band
sources.description:
Out of a time-rotted tomb crawls an unspeakable horror!
A newly appointed cemetery chairman believes that, merely by inserting a black plot-marking pin into a wall-sized map of the cemetery, he can cause the deaths of that plot’s owner.

Original title: I Bury the Living (1958)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/pHY2LvTFwaA


Director: Albert Band
Writers: Louis Garfinkle
Stars: Richard Boone, Theodore Bikel, Peggy Maurer
Genre:  Colorized classics, Cult, Horror, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
05:26 Exploration of a cemetery map leads to shocking consequences during a fateful visit.
12:12 A lunch meeting takes an unexpected turn, revealing surprising connections and emotional revelations.
20:47 A man reflects on a string of mysterious deaths and the eerie power of suggestion.
26:46 An investigation into unexplained deaths deepens, raising suspicions and the threat of resignation.
32:18 Tensions rise as Bob and Ann’s mysterious conversation leads to a confrontation and possible fallout.
38:09 A wave of suspicious deaths strikes after a cemetery meeting, sparking confusion and fear.
47:16 Mystery thickens as characters face an uncertain fate, with a man missing and murder in the air.
56:50 Black and white pins on a map reveal chilling secrets as an investigation uncovers shocking truths.
1:12:10 A race against time unfolds as the investigation into mysterious deaths uncovers unsettling discoveries.
